name: J. Breeden
comment: I just want to say that these CURREN watches are awesome !!! I have bought five in the past few months and had no problems with them . They do come in a little big around the wrist .

name: Elyssa Perry
comment: It's a really comfy watch and hopefully with the automatic Seiko movement inside it should last a long time. Can't fault it at all for the money.

name: Dennis A
comment: Very nice watch, the case looked really small when I first unboxed it but I think that was just because I was used to something bigger.

name: Russel
comment: I've owned one for 5 years the 18 ct electro plate still the same from new hard wearing time piece very reliable worth every penny stevie northfleet

name: Smith
comment: These smartwatches branded as MK are fossil smartwatches under the skin. Dont expect a life beyond 2years or any repair from this watch in the future .

name: Alen Walker
comment: First off this is a beautiful watch with characterful looks.

name: E. Simmons
comment: Its a lovely watch. I bought this in a sale and didn't think I would reach much for it, but actually do quite often because it looks great on me. Surprisingly good fine.

name: Paul M. Ward
comment: Very nice watch, comes packaged carefully and box it comes in is very chic and clean. Very happy with the purchase, my dad will be very happy on his birthday :)
